class.name: CheckButton
class.description: CheckButton is a toggle button displayed as a check field. It's similar to [CheckBox] in functionality, but it has a different appearance. To follow established UX patterns, it's recommended to use CheckButton when toggling it has an [b]immediate[/b] effect on something. For instance, it should be used if toggling it enables/disables a setting without requiring the user to press a confirmation button. See also [BaseButton] which contains common properties and methods associated with this node.
